      tax - tax on total charges
      roomServices - room service charges
      discount - discount applied
      totalCharges - total charges
      paymentMethod - method of payment
      orderThisRoom - array list of orders for a room
      numberOfNights - number of nights stayed
      creditCardName - guest's credit card name
      billingAddress - guest's billing address
      billingCardNumber - guest's billing card number
